statements: SELECT * FROM currency
SELECT currency_name, currency_symbol FROM currency
SELECT currency_name, currency_symbol, currency_exchange_rate FROM currency WHERE currency_id = 1
SELECT * FROM currency WHERE currency_exchange_rate > 1.0
SELECT currency_name, currency_exchange_rate FROM currency ORDER BY currency_exchange_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM currency ORDER BY currency_name DESC, currency_exchange_rate ASC
SELECT currency_name, currency_symbol FROM currency WHERE currency_id > 5
SELECT currency_name, currency_exchange_rate FROM currency WHERE currency_symbol = 'USD'
SELECT * FROM currency WHERE currency_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20
SELECT currency_name, currency_exchange_rate FROM currency WHERE currency_exchange_rate > 1.00
SELECT * FROM currency;
SELECT currency_name, currency_symbol FROM currency;
SELECT currency_id, currency_name FROM currency ORDER BY currency_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, currency_name, transaction_amount FROM transaction JOIN currency ON transaction.currency_id = currency.currency_id;
SELECT * FROM currency WHERE currency_name = 'USD';
SELECT currency_name, currency_symbol FROM currency ORDER BY currency_name DESC;
SELECT currency_name, currency_symbol FROM currency WHERE currency_id != 3;
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT currency_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM currency JOIN transaction ON currency.currency_id = transaction.currency_id GROUP BY currency_name HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM currency;
SELECT id, name, symbol FROM currency ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, symbol FROM currency WHERE symbol = '$' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, amount, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM currency WHERE id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, symbol FROM currency ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, amount, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type='purchase' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, name, value FROM currency WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM user_inventory WHERE user_id = 2 AND currency_id = 3
SELECT id, name, value FROM currency ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM currency WHERE value > 1000
SELECT name, value FROM currency ORDER BY value DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT users.username, currency.name, user_inventory.amount FROM users INNER JOIN user_inventory ON users.id = user_inventory.user_id INNER JOIN currency ON currency.id = user_inventory.currency_id
SELECT users.username, users.email, transactions.amount, currency.name FROM users INNER JOIN transactions ON users.id = transactions.id INNER JOIN currency ON transactions.currency_id = currency.id

SELECT item_name, item_price FROM item WHERE item_price > 10
SELECT player.player_name, wallet.balance FROM player JOIN wallet ON player.player_id = wallet.player_id

SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM item ORDER BY item_price DESC;
SELECT player_name, balance FROM player JOIN wallet ON player.player_id = wallet.player_id WHERE balance > 500;
